actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution disapproving a proposed regulation transmitted under section 316(c) of the Federal Election Campaign Act.

summary.text: Disapproves the regulation proposed by the Chairman of the Federal Election Commission which pertains to the filing of required statements and reports by a candidate for the office of Representative, Delegate, or Resident Commissioner, and by political committees supporting such candidate.

titles.title: Resolution disapproving a proposed regulation transmitted under section 316(c) of the Federal Election Campaign Act.
